settings.title: HomeWizard settings
settings.intro: To connect to your HomeWizard we need the settings below.
settings.heatlink_intro: To connect to your Heatlink we need to know to wich HomeWizard it belongs.
settings.energylink_intro: To connect to your Energylink we need to know to wich HomeWizard it belongs.
settings.wattcher_intro: To connect to your Wattcher we need to know to wich HomeWizard it belongs.
settings.thermometer_intro: To connect to your thermometer we need to know to wich HomeWizard it belongs.
settings.use_ledring_explain: Ledring lights up green when preset switched successful, red when not successful
